summary.span: Manages project persistence and stores and retrieves code and other items using save and load operations implemented by the host.

span.span: Manages project persistence and stores and retrieves code and other items using save and load operations implemented by the host.

summary.span: Saves an arbitrary source string with a given name parameter, which can then be used in a call to the method to reload the string.
